attributes.action: Close the loophole allowing a few super-rich non-domiciled foreigners living tax free in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Treasury refuses to close the loophole allowing some of the world's richest people to live tax-free in the UK whilst ordinary British people face an increasing tax burden. As a result the high end property market is being distorted by the influx of untaxed money. No other country allows such exemption from tax, and it causes tax on the majority to be higher as a result.
